item.title: uxss-js-a-collection-of-uxss-browser-exploits
item.description:
uxss.js: a library of UXSS exploits

article

In order to promote awareness of the dangers of browser UXSS vulnerabilities, I have started a framework for exploiting these vulns. Current supported browser versions include:

  • Chrome 21 and below
  • Firefox 16 and below
item.dc:creator: jnix

item.title: why-x-frame-options-is-useless-for-mitigating-uxss
item.description: I first ran into X-Frame-Options when trying to abuse a UXSS bug I had found. I wanted to steal autofilled form data from a webmail login page, but the page was sent with the X-Frame-Options
item.dc:creator: jnix

item.title: crawling-osx-dsstore-file-urls
item.description: Now that you have file access using Flash, let's figure out how to crawl a user's HD to make this access more useful. If your victim runs OSX, you can request the .DS_Store files at specific locati
item.dc:creator: jnix

item.title: bypass-chrome-local-file-access-restrictions-with-flash
